Text: Re Global Master Repurchase Agreementafternoon Sara Please accept my apologies for not responding earlier With regard to the pre printed terms of the PSAISMA Global Master Repurchase Agreement GMRA please find enclosed one copy herein for your information See attached file PREPRINTED TERMS OF THE GMRA DATED AS MAY doc In addition you did mention about the existing repo doc with Enron North America Please note that the negotiations of the BMA former PSA are handled by our New York head office so I shall check with my colleague and revert Could you please advise what you require me to do are you checking to find out if we have a BMA in place or do you need an executed copy of the BMA Please advise With best regards Monica PREPRINTED TERMS OF THE GMRA DATED AS MAY doc
